title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, November 2, 2020
description: It's the birthday of the frontiersman Daniel Boone (1734-1820), who said, "I have never been lost, but I will admit to being confused for several weeks."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of the frontiersman Daniel Boone (1734-1820), who said, "I have never been lost, but I will admit to being confused for several weeks."
